lines:
1917

April 
SOV 2 
19 19

Mr. Sung Sing Kwan

536 Commonwealth Ave.

Boston, Mass.

y dear Kvan:

Your nice letter of April 4th is on my desk. Miss Lee has al -
ready written woh Niss Ciemons and me, thanking us for our small contriibu -
tion to your happy party. I only hope that you and 15 s9 Leo mjoyed it 
as nuch as we did and that all the guest s had a royal good time. If that 
13 80, we shall have been more shan repaid for anything and everything we

dia.

I am returning your check herewith, much as I appreciate the

generous spirit that prompted you to send it.

It was a pleasure and privi -
lege to give the party; and after all the kindness es I have been accorded by

your own people in times past I count it little enough to be able to do this

slight favor for a member of the family whom also I have come to regard al -
most as a naber of my own family circle as well. I beg of you therefore 
not to give this side of the matter another thought, but believe me when I 
say that it was both a pleasure and a privilege to do this favor for you. 
Come out when you can, and we'll talk it all over.

Host sincerely yours,
raw: 1917 April SOV 2 19 19 Mr. Sung Sing Kwan 536 Commonwealth Ave. Boston, Mass. y dear Kvan: Your nice letter of April 4th is on my desk. Miss Lee has already written woh Niss Ciemons and me, thanking us for our small contriibution to your happy party. I only hope that you and 15 s9 Leo mjoyed it as nuch as we did and that all the guest s had a royal good time. If that 13 80, we shall have been more shan repaid for anything and everything we dia. I am returning your check herewith, much as I appreciate the generous spirit that prompted you to send it. It was a pleasure and privilege to give the party; and after all the kindness es I have been accorded by your own people in times past I count it little enough to be able to do this slight favor for a member of the family whom also I have come to regard almost as a naber of my own family circle as well. I beg of you therefore not to give this side of the matter another thought, but believe me when I say that it was both a pleasure and a privilege to do this favor for you. Come out when you can, and we'll talk it all over. Host sincerely yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter returning $30 check for the party and expressing the pleasure of hosting the party for them, as one would for a family member.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
